name: Stone Soul (JustHellygar, ButteredCoffee)
description:
Stone Soul is a circuit-based puzzle game with a built-in level editor.

Play as a cute golem character and try to escape each level by creating simple or complex circuits, or use the level editor to practice your level design skills, create interesting mechanisms or train your creativity. Save and share your creations with your friends or play other people's levels.

In-Game:

W, A, S, D - Move Around

Left Click - Pick Up/Place Items

R - Rotate Items You Have Picked

You can bump into switches or step on buttons to activate and deactivate them.

Level Editor:

Left Click - Select and Place Items (You can hold Left Click to draw.)

R - Rotate Selected Item

Q - Circle Trough an Item's Variants

SPACE - Start/Stop Test

Join our community!

Get in contact with us and keep in touch with any updates.
